    • Field Detail

      • LOADED

        public static final State LOADED
        LOADED state. This state is virtual.

      • PAUSED

        public static final State PAUSED
        PAUSED state. This state can be reached when initXlet invoked from LOADED or pauseXlet invoked from ACTIVE.

      • ACTIVE

        public static final State ACTIVE
        ACTIVE(STARTED) state. XletMachine can be reached to this state when pauseXlet invoked from PAUSED.

      • DESTROYED

        public static final State DESTROYED
        DESTROYED state.
